unnormalised: The rooftop solar subsidy scheme is a welcome initiative. However, clarity regarding the disbursement process, especially for Tier-II cities like Nagpur, is crucial. Many applicants have faced delays exceeding 6 months. A transparent portal, perhaps managed by institutions like IIT-Bombay, showing real-time status updates after applications submitted on, say, 26/01/2024, is needed. We need clearer guidelines from MNRE by 17/07/2024 at 14:00 hrs on the process post empanelment to ensure timely financial assistance like Rs. 50,000 is received before Diwali, anticipated on 01/11/2024.
normalised: The rooftop solar subsidy scheme is a welcome initiative. However, clarity regarding the disbursement process, especially for Tier two cities like Nagpur, is crucial. Many applicants have faced delays exceeding six months. A transparent portal, perhaps managed by institutions like I I T-Bombay, showing real-time status updates after applications submitted on, say, twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty four, is needed. We need clearer guidelines from M N R E by seventeenth July two thousand and twenty four at two P M on the process post empanelment to ensure timely financial assistance like rupee fifty thousand is received before Diwali, anticipated on first November two thousand and twenty four.
